programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o vlowres.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
kamp init p4 asig vco2 kamp, 110 ;saw wave kfco line 30, p3, 300 ;vary the cutoff frequency from 30 to 300 Hz. kres = 20 ksep = p5 ;different resonance values iord = p6 ;and different number of filters aout vlowres asig, kfco, kres, iord, ksep aclp clip aout, 1, 1 ;avoid distortion outs aclp, aclp
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f 1 0 16384 10 1 ;sine
s i 1 0 10 .1 5 2 ;compensate volume and i 1 + 10 .1 25 2 ;number of filters = 2 s i 1 0 10 .01 5 6 ;compensate volume and i 1 + 10 .04 15 6 ;number of filters = 6
e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
